Text.Page:
The Wondrous Seal Stone is the barrier that prevents us from reaching Terkasia's inner chamber.

Fortunately for us, federation intelligence has come up with a solution: a seal deactivation scroll.

Once we've used the scroll, we can figure out what Terkasia is trying so hard to protect.

Argons? HERE!?!

Oh, no.

This means the Cult of Lok...and Atel Akaad...are working with the argons.

This means doom.
